Hello and Welcome to WISER WORLD 

WISER WORLD is a small team of young minds with an initiative towards building independent literature on evaluative issues and events affecting our Society. The idea is to connect the world with complete well-researched knowledge cutting the mainstream propaganda to shape a full informed civil society. We strive to create thought-provoking multidisciplinary content. 

We believe in a world where everyone can connect to learn. WISER WORLD is an initiative towards building independent literature on evaluative issues and events. Our aim is to create a community dedicated to conducting research that contributes to a more effective public discourse and to invest in education in order to empower our generation.

Mission Statement

“Maximise citizens’ wisdom and savoir-faire by; engaging in discussions. To become a platform that invests in education in order to empower our generation”

Achievements 

We started Wiser World out of our passion for learning and a networking medium during the COVID-19 pandemic lockdown in March 2020. Since then we have come across many opportunities to meet and connect with brilliant people who have joined us in our journey.

We have a network of UG and PG students coming from top universities from all over India. We also have a group of international students working with us from Canada, London, Germany, Singapore and South Africa. We have worked with more than rotating 150 students and scholars combined in multidisciplinary themes and topics.

We have reached out to many academicians and industry experts time and again to get expert views, discuss the prospects and consult regarding different topics we were working on. Under their guidance, We have also organised informative webinar sessions on a variety of themes such as “India’s economics revival and opportunities”, “Understanding the risk of rising US interest rates”, “Reform in the public financial management system in India”, “Future of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency in India” etc.

We also run a monthly special edition on “Global Financial Market Outlook Analysis” and “India’s Foreign Policy Report” where we extensively research and present our analysis on ongoing activities in the global financial market and foreign affairs respectively.

We were also invited by the Maharaja Agarsen College, Delhi University, for their Summer Internship fair 2021.
